title: Move Inventory with a Forklift
description: A forklift operator is assigned a task to move a full pallet of goods from a receiving lane to a bulk storage location.

tasks.description: The operator accepts a 'Put-Away' task on their vehicle-mounted terminal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The task details (item, quantity, from/to locations) are displayed.

tasks.description: The operator drives to the 'from' location (receiving lane) and scans the pallet's license plate to confirm they have the right pallet.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system verifies the correct pallet is being moved.

tasks.description: The operator drives to the 'to' location (bulk storage) and scans the location's barcode.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system verifies the destination location.

tasks.description: The operator deposits the pallet and confirms the task completion on their terminal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The task is marked as complete, and the system inventory now shows the pallet in the new location.
